summary: Updated three .claude/ context files to document LaTeX conventions: (1) standardized placement of \leansrc references at end of sections with \noindent prefix, and (2) use of \set{} macro for set notation. Added validation checklist items to both style guide and rules files.

artifacts.summary: Added Lean Source Reference Placement subsection with rules and examples
Added Set Notation section and validation checklist items
Added two validation checklist items for new conventions
Implementation summary documenting all changes made

completion_data.completion_summary: Updated 3 .claude/ context files to document LaTeX conventions for \leansrc reference placement and \set{} macro usage, with validation checklist items.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added Lean Source Reference Placement section to cross-references.md, Set Notation section to latex-style-guide.md, and 2 validation checklist items to latex.md rules

next_steps: Review implementation and verify conventions are applied consistently in future LaTeX edits
